name: Greg Stievenart
text: Who ordered the soup? Wettest mess of a pizza. Pass on this one.

name: Andrew Cederstrom
text: Love the all u can eat deal for $5! Get the small fountain drink with it. Only 35 cents! Awesome meal for just over$5! Only M-W 4p to 8p. Pizza is real good! Not quite excellent.

name: Ron Jamison
text: This place is way overpriced considering there is no consistency. Pizza is often undercooked, sometimes burnt, SKIMPY toppings, rarely done properly. Super long waits (an hr and a half for one cheese pizza?????!!!!) Used to be a family …More

name: Allen Moulton
text: Food so greasy and no taste. U pick up the pizza what very very little toppings were on it fell off. The cheese didn't even cover the pizza. Pizza not cut had one peace that was a 1/4 of the pizza. Could only check down 1 peace. Had to complain got all r money back. Came up to sebastian's for some really excellent pizza

name: Lee Ann Bellegarde
text: I am a fan of pan pizza, but I have to say I love their regular pizza here. Pasta dishes are really good as well.

name: commandervulkan
text: I think in the past year of me ordering I've gotten a delivery on time. Expect all delivery orders to arrive at-least 1 hour after ordering online. If they arrive sooner consider it a pleasant surprise.

name: Rebel Runner
text: Ridiculous prices. Sloppy pizzas. Long waits. Rude staff. I'll pass.

name: Spencer Poore
text: The best pizza from a large chain by far. The staff at the Gloucester location are very helpful and provide great customer service.

name: jessica perrine
text: Love Papa's pizza... Always have... And its quick!

name: Sam Marranca
text: The employees were very nice but the food was not very good. It was somewhat expensive. I would only return in a pinch. However, there is good parking and a large restroom.

name: Lenin Acosta
text: Went to grab some lunch was the only customer in the store and was waiting for someone to take my order. An employee walk by looked at me without saying a word and went to the back, the other 2 cooks in the kitchen area didn't even look my …More

name: Ricky Duncan
text: Food and service was pretty good.

name: Chassity York
text: Really horrible customer service and delivery times. I’ve ordered there twice in the past month and it’s taken more than an hour, close to two hours for delivery. Not even a sorry and i’ve has to call multiple times to make sure the food is even on its way. Overpriced as well and really greasy pizza.

name: Dawn Miceli
text: Pizza is decent and the cashier was very nice.

name: Amanda Morway
text: Pizza can't be beat...really great flavor. Excellent service, staff was very friendly and helpful!

name: Shannon Meuse
text: Very clean restaurant, large dining room and pleasant staff!  Tasty pizza!

name: DRONED PERSPECTIVES
text: If you want low quality and want to wait forever... then order here. If you want good Pizza in a timely manner, go up the street to Dominos. These people are slower than molasses!!!

name: sam bell
text: Shame all Papa Ginos pulled out of the cape ann area in such a rush.

name: Erik Stefanowski
text: Great food fast and a good price

name: Nicole Ross
text: Tried to order for delivery twice recently and apparently they only (had) one delivery guy and his car broke down. Had to go elsewhere which is fine but the lack of delivery must be killing their business.

name: Dale Whitman
text: Terrible customer service. The employee I had to deal with was a rude, abrupt, interrupting, excuse-making woman who totally lacked any skills in dealing with the public. Inexcusably poor business practices.

name: Gardner H. Winchester II
text: All You Can Eat Pizza Night!  Not bad.

name: Andrew Lee Halsted
text: Service is always a little slow but still best dough and crust around

name: Catherine Wagner
text: The restaurant was clean and spacious and the food was decent.

name: Mark Andrews
text: Totaly sucks waited love. An hour for a cheese  pizza never again

name: Ricky Paquiot
text: Their Huge chocolate chip cookies are super good.

name: Anthony Nigro
text: Good pizza and food with a large seating area. Right in the middle of the historic downtown area

name: Alissa Silva
text: My experience was awful.  I took my 2 grandkids there today for lunch.We had to wait 15 mins for the kids chicken fingures and then 20 mins for a slice. Mean while including myself and grandkids there were 2 other people there. As I was waiting for my slice they were serving others slices. I would hate to go there on a busy day

name: Chad Ryan
text: Fair. Decent food, but not near the quality it should be for the price.

name: Malia Hartwell
text: Honestly I'm very upset. I got mozzarella sticks from this place and ONLY ONE HAD CHEESE. So I paid for fried bread crumbs... THANKS

name: Jim Bridger
text: Plenty of better local places in Gloucester, no reason to go to a crappy chain. There's a reason this place is always empty.

name: CODY!
text:
we ordered a margarita pizza to pick up
we got a cheese pizza.
been trying to call …More

name: Yuleni Morales
text: Used to love their buffalo Mac & cheese till I found hair in it. Completely grossed out and never eating it again

name: Bryan Slyvinski
text: delivery driver yelled at me over the phone- don't want food from a place where the employees can't follow customer service

name: Lisa McNeilly
text: good pizza luv the bread sticks lol

name: Linda Lee
text: Pizza just okay

name: Robert O'Brien
text: Not the best

name: Christopher Cefalo
text: Great food

name: Keegan Campbell
text: SLOW AF!!! 3rd time calling this place and it takes  OVER a hour a make a damn pizza!!!!! Slow employees!!!! GET NEW STAFF!!!!

name: Jade Smith
text: Friendly staff

name: Steve Mc
text: Mmm

name: Larry Nelson Sr
text: Delay was much longer than expected or described

name: Marilinn Mayer
text: National pizza day HOORAY

name: Nick Browning
text: This place is garbage.

name: Justin Demetri
text: Not a fan of this papa's

name: Margie AbeLL
text: can't order on line...grrrrrrr

name: Gerald Grether
text: Expensive for the food bread sucks fries good

name: Matthew Arlington
text: Good food love breadsticks

name: Eugenio Maria Ciancimino
text: I ordered a pizza by phone and was never delivered. They said just 30 minutes....I'm still waiting my pizza.
